pageTitle: Alliant Blog | Resumes that win jobs for recent college grads
textBeforeTable: Employers are usually bombarded by resumes for open jobs. If you’re a recent college grad, your odds of scoring an interview are increased when you rank high in these attributes (on a scale of 1 to 100). Note: your work track record trumps the list despite the old catch-22 adage that “you can’t get the job without the experience and you can’t get experience without the job.” These accomplishments will help make your resume gain positive attention: Resumes that win jobs for recent college grads
